title: Mac client: mouse shakes randomly in-game only
body:
for whatever reason the mouse cursor only shakes in-game screwing up where i want to point n click, is there a way to fix it?

thanks weebs!!

replies.body:
I'm having same issue. I'm on a new mac (Sierra).  Any fix to this?
I don't have hot corners enabled.

*** EDIT: I THINK I SOLVED THE PROBLEM=> 1) go to Options ( Esc key).  2) under GAMES tab, uncheck "Use Software Mouse"

I will try that now and get back to you. 


ok it worked
I will try that now and get back to you.

The same thing has happened to me.  I have tried it on multiple servers, KR, EUNE , EUW.  My cursor shakes and it started after my Mac Sierra Update. Is there anything that can be done for Mac Users. Date today is Feb 28th 2018.   Please help me. I hope Riot reads this and fixes the problem. My mouse works fine on other games, I have reinstalled the game and restarted the computer. I'm not sure what else I can do. I reduced the resolution also. Nothing has changed. I wish I didn't update to (Sierra).  I would really like to play again.

Are you running a Mac or Windows PC? We've had this issue pop up for Mac players if the Hot Corners feature has been enabled while playing League. I recommend [**disabling this feature**](http://osxdaily.com/2016/08/10/disable-hot-corners-mac/) if you're running a Mac.
